Opinion | Democrats Are Losing the War for Attention. Badly. - The New York Times — “the technological infrastructure of podcasts matters tremendously. That line — I forget who wrote it — being able to say, “‘Wherever you get your podcasts’ is a radical statement.” The fact that podcasts have built audiences largely outside of algorithmic feeds, have built them through an open protocol called R.S.S. That technical backbone actually matters for precisely what you’re talking about.” — hard to predict what you work will matter. Never would have predicted back in rooms with a couple of other weirdos that RSS and OAuth would be the most impactful things I worked on.
